General.Name: Rigol Technologies Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Rigol Technologies Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells test and measurement instruments worldwide. The company's products include digital oscilloscopes, waveform-generators, spectrum analyzers, RF-signal-generators, programmable DC electronic loaders, programmable DC power supplies, digital multimeters, and data acquisition mainframes. It also offers IoT test solutions, EMI-pre-test, spectrum-monitoring, automotive-electronics, power-analysis, and education solutions. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.
General.Address: No.8 Ke Ling Road, Suzhou, China
